attributes.action: Schools to enforce a no tolerance ban on E-Cigs
attributes.additional_details: We have yet to find out the long term effect that ecigs might have. Kids can now smoke these and it will go unnoticed as there is no smell etc.. They can now put other liquids in the Ecigs to get high..
attributes.background: Ecigs have become so popular with the teens of society especially the younger boys.. we need to all try and get it under control.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of schools and local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition to introduce new legal controls on the sale of e-cigarettes if that is something you would like to see happen.
